title: Projects
intro: A selection of my research and engineering work.

items.title: Kinematic Force-Directed Graph Embeddings
items.summary: Novel graph embedding paradigm with O(n²) → O(n log n) complexity reduction.

items.title: Enterprise Knowledge Graph System
items.summary: Production KG infrastructure handling 4M+ nodes with millisecond queries.

items.title: LLM-Powered Construction Knowledge Graphs
items.summary: Automated conflict detection in construction documents using LLMs and KGs.
